description: Sequential twin-turbo rotary power in a body that looks like it was sculpted by wind. The FD RX-7 is Mazda's masterpiece â€” a front-midship layout with near-perfect 50:50 weight distribution and one of the most exotic engines ever fitted to a production sports car.
lore: The 13B-REW screams like nothing else on four wheels. Rotary owners will tell you the apex seals are a myth, the fuel economy is a feature, and the sound at 9000 RPM is worth every rebuild. They're not wrong about the sound.
